author: potuz
content: Alright, the second PR has all the forkchoice tests (and validation tests) passing <https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3854> this is as much as I'm willing to work on the Python spec without a commitment to ship this. I'll focus now on Prysm

author: potuz
content: It's over 3K lines of a PR so I understand it may be scary,
